title: Go Escape
description: Go Escape is a fast-paced one-button arcade game where reflexes and timing are your best allies. Control a rolling ball and guide it through a maze of spikes, moving platforms, and deadly traps. One wrong move, and it's game over! Your goal is to escape each level by jumping at just the right moment and avoiding everything that can destroy you. The game starts off simple but quickly becomes a real test of precision and skill.
